fields.title: Harris 1992 New York City Quality of Life Survey, study no. 912081

dsDescription.dsDescriptionValue: This survey of New York City residents focuses on the city as a place to work, economic opportunity, a place to live, raise a family, and a place for recreation and leisure. The study included separate surveys - Wave I and Wave II.

fields.notesText: Subject: Study Level Error Note, Notes: Telephone surveys of residents 18 years of age or older living in the Bronx, Kings, New York, Queens, and Richmond boroughs.; Residents living in the five boroughs of New York City with telephones.; Subject: null  Type: ODUM:ACCESS.CATEGORY  Notes: I; Subject: null  Type: ODUM:CODEBOOK.NUMBER  Notes: H-912081;

distributor.distributorName: Odum Institute for Research in Social Science
